channel.title: How to change what npc "Dark mage says"
channel.description:
im using pimpscape base source.
1. i know that u go into npchandler look for "Owner" is online blah blah... 2. when i edit it and save it, then go back into my server he doesnt say what i want him to say
can some1 point out this error and help me

yeah i did, its really strange
